title: El Cuerpo
subtitle: The Body
meta_desc: Learn about the body in Spanish (cuerpo, cabeza, brazos, piernas) with audio pronunciation and word highlighting. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish body parts, el cuerpo Spanish, body in Spanish, bilingual children books, Spanish vocabulary kids

pages.title: El Cuerpo
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors. A happy child standing with arms out showing their whole body.

pages.title: Esta es mi cabeza.
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors. A child touching the top of their head with both hands, smiling.

pages.title: Estos son mis brazos.
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors. A child stretching both arms wide open like an airplane.

pages.title: Estas son mis piernas.
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors. A child kicking a soccer ball with their legs in a park.

pages.title: Esta es mi barriga.
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors. A child patting their tummy after eating, happy expression.

pages.title: Mi cuerpo puede moverse.
